results.original_title: Quiero tener una ferretería en Andalucía
results.overview: Since the mid-70s, Joe Strummer, the former leader of The Clash, was irresistibly attracted to Andalusia. This documentary is a fun and revealing chronicle of the adventures of Strummer in Granada and Almeria, of his trying to leave behind his rock star aura, to get away from the myth of The Clash and become anonymous.
results.title: Quiero tener una ferretería en Andalucía

results.original_title: Cyprienne oder Lassen wir uns scheiden!
results.title: Cyprienne oder Lassen wir uns scheiden!

results.overview: After a fateful miss, an assassin battles his employers, and himself, on an international manhunt he insists isn't personal.
results.title: The Killer

results.overview: Each of the three short films in this collection presents a young gay man at the threshold of adulthood. In "Pool Days," Justin is a 17-year old Bethesda lad, hired as the evening life guard at a fitness center. In the course of the summer, he realizes and embraces that he's gay. In "A Friend of Dorothy," Winston arrives from upstate for his freshman year at NYU. He has to figure out, with some help from Anne, a hometown friend, how to build a social life as a young gay man in the city. In "The Disco Years," Tom looks back on 1978, the year in high school that he came out of the closet after one joyful and several painful encounters
results.title: Boys Life

results.overview: With a career in the music industry spanning over six decades, it’s no surprise that Bob Ezrin is finding it difficult to write his memoir.
results.title: Bob Ezrin: The Damn Book

results.original_title: Bailes inverosímiles en cajeros automáticos nocturnos
results.overview: Moisés, a man trapped in a routine, enters an irrational world when he discovers the magic of K-pop.
results.title: Weird Dancing in All-Night Computer-Banking Lobbies

results.original_title: The Mine with the Iron Door
results.overview: Having acquired the controlling interest in the Eureka Discovery Corporation for five-hundred dollars, and selling half of it to a detective for two-hundred dollars, Bob Harvey sets off with his new partner to find the buried treasure of San Capello---with very strange consequences.
results.title: The Mine with the Iron Door

results.overview: The sixth season finale of the popular Biblical television series, following Jesus' arrest and trial leading up to His crucifixion.
results.title: The Chosen: Crucifixion

results.overview: A 12-year-old boy comes of age in 1969 Key West against the backdrop of the Apollo moon landing, when he begins to sell cocaine so his mother can stop stripping.
results.title: CrissCross

results.overview: After procuring a special ray gun, a precocious orphan helps his community by exposing the shady doings of local government, and plays a part in a cute couple getting together.
results.title: The Rocket Man

results.original_title: RFVideo Face Off Vol. 15: Stronger Than Death & Hurricanes
results.overview: It’s time for RF VIDEO to bring you another addition to our Face Off DVD series and this time we went out and found two of the most open and honest pro wrestlers who both achieved so much success in the pro wrestling industry.  One half of the Hardy Boys Matt Hardy and Shane Helms broke into the business around the same year and their careers pretty much paralleled each other.  One went into the WWE with his brother and the other started out in WCW as a cruiserweight.  Both men met for the first time as they put in their hours doing the local indy scene in the Carolinas.  Their paths crossed for the first time in Omega where they both learned the ropes and started their journey to superstardom.For the first time ever RF VIDEO brings together both men to discuss the current state of the pro wrestling business in 2012.
results.title: RFVideo Face Off Vol. 15: Stronger Than Death & Hurricanes

results.overview: Two Cowboys; Millsy, brilliant but mute, and Otis, rambling and stupid, set off to rob a bank. On the way, they stop to see their boss, only to discover he has been murdered by another Cowboy, who claims to be a ghost.
results.title: Unto the Apparition of Phantoms

results.overview: A behind-the-scenes look at the Aldeburgh Festival and the opening by The Queen of the new concert hall at Snape.
results.title: Benjamin Britten and His Festival

results.overview: Brennan is an outcast drifter who threatens to destroy a family's unity by displacing their son, Mike, while he is away at college. The Silent Thief is a thriller that examines familial bonds and the line between sanity and insanity.
results.title: The Silent Thief

results.overview: The Black Ball, inspired by an unfinished play by Federico García Lorca, will be a queer vindication about three men in three different moments of Spanish history: 1932, 1937, and 2017.
results.title: The Black Ball

results.original_title: Is Dead - Portrait incomplet de Gertrude Stein
results.overview: The life and work of Gertrude Stein (1874-1946), an American writer who lived in France for more than half of her life ("... not the half that made me, but the half when I did what I did..."), presented in a montage of her autobiographical texts, with pictures from today mixed with archives from the past.
results.title: Is Dead - Portrait incomplet de Gertrude Stein

results.overview: A documentary examining the 1955 murder of a 14-year-old black boy from Chicago while visiting relatives in Mississippi, and the broad impact of his death, his funeral, and the subsequent trial and acquittal of his accused killers.
results.title: The Murder of Emmett Till

results.overview: From the experience of a transvestite from Los Angeles, the A. shows how race and sexuality are closely intertwined. Through the malleability of the disguised identity, the A. shows an inspired philosophy of Gramsci on the practice considered as subculture field.
results.title: The White To Be Angry

results.overview: This interview was conducted shortly after the late President Dr. Salvador Allende won the Chilean elections of 1970. Dr. Salvador Allende was the first democratically elected socialist president in Latin America. Three years later, Allende was killed during a coupe lead by General that overthrew the Allende government.
results.title: Conversation with Allende

results.overview: The father of his girlfriend does not want her to spend a few days with Carlos, so he needs a companion.  Therefore, he asks a friend to pretend to be his aunt. This will create endless trouble and confusion, especially when the real aunt of Charles arrives.
results.title: La tía de Carlos

results.overview: The story of a love triangle, in which a romanian and a hungarian love the same woman. Happening during WWII, the two hate each other. The movie was banned shortly after the release.
results.title: Two Men for One Death

results.overview: Concert at El Castell Embruixat, 03/05/2006
results.title: The National - Live at El Castell Embruixat

results.title: Ein Fall für den Fuchs - Das Spiel ist aus

results.overview: The ultimate wish-fulfillment tale of a teenage Gran Turismo player whose gaming skills won him a series of Nissan competitions to become an actual professional racecar driver.
